articles.title: Personalized brain circuit scores identify clinically distinct biotypes in depression and anxiety - Nature.com
articles.description: Personalized brain circuit measures quantified using a new imaging technology in 801 patients with depression and anxiety identify six biotypes with unique symptoms, behaviors and responses to different types of treatment.
